author: Tan Lee Meng J (delivering the judgment of the court):
casename: Public Prosecutor v Teo Chee Seng
coram: Chao Hick Tin JA; Tan Lee Meng J; Yong Pung How CJ
counsel: Cheng Howe Ming, Woo Kar Wai and Jason Chan (Deputy Public Prosecutors) for the appellant; Michael Chia (Sankar Ow and Partners) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Criminal Procedure and Sentencing/Sentencing/Benchmark sentences/Respondent convicted of culpable homicide not amounting to murder for causing death of infant by feeding her medicated oil/Additional charge of fabricating false evidence taken into consideration for sentencing purposes/Whether sentence of four years' imprisonment manifestly inadequate/Whether trial judge justified in departing from sentencing norm
